item.title: Concrete block on pavement outside front of 1 Hampden Avenue needs repair., 3rd August
item.description:
Concrete block that runs outside 1 Hampden Avenueâ€™s property boundary (on pavement) is broken / missing and needs repair. This appears to have been like this for over a year judging by Google maps. Paving blocks outside other properties on the street look to be in decent condition.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hampden Avenue, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severe Rat Issues, 3rd August
item.description:
Between 162 -214b Northumberland Park there are many bin cupboards. Next to the cupboards are small flower areas. The flower areas are severely over run with severe rat runs. One of the flats regularly dumps cat litter into on of the flowers beds. I would highly recommend removing the beds. The beds are not maintained.. This would cease the rats from harbouring near the bins. Every time you approach the bins to dispose of waste you have to be on alert. A Rat will either run out, be in the bins on hanging from the shoot. Mostly the baby rats are running in and out the runs. It you're walking late at night you .need to be on alert from rustling in the bushes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northumberland Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged car park logs, 3rd August
item.description:
1 x car park log is on the ground near Roberts Close garage compound. A couple of yards away from the compound, another is slightly dislodged. Close by another has smoke damage on the top of the log. Another log needs attention near Staplehurst House.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Kent Road, Poverest, London
